name: Zombie Bomb 10
description:
Fullscreen is recommended.

Our entry for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam.

You’ve been thrown into an arena with endless zombies and no hope, but don’t go down without a fight. Every 10 seconds a bomb spawns in the middle of the arena. Make sure you’re prepared to use your force field to protect yourself.

Controls: WASD to Move Mouse to Move Camera Left Mouse Button to Shoot Left Shift to use Force Field
